授業方法:
This course is held as a workshop with discussions, self-directed research and presentations, with communication and materials primarily in English.
This course will be conducted face-to-face, however, for students who are permitted to take classes online, there will be a real-time, online classes via ZOOM, the link will be shared in the class LUNA page (beginning in session 4).
